title: Tests that download from internet should retry on failure
body_html:
Example failure from intermittent network problem:

Oct 24 20:08:02 =================================== FAILURES ===================================
Oct 24 20:08:02 _________________________ TestCaffe2End2End.test_zfnet _________________________
Oct 24 20:08:02 
Oct 24 20:08:02 self = <caffe2.python.onnx.tests.c2_ref_test.TestCaffe2End2End testMethod=test_zfnet>
Oct 24 20:08:02 
Oct 24 20:08:02     @unittest.skipIf(
Oct 24 20:08:02         os.environ.get('JENKINS_URL'),
Oct 24 20:08:02         'Taking too long to download!')
Oct 24 20:08:02     def test_zfnet(self):
Oct 24 20:08:02 >       self._test_net('zfnet')
Oct 24 20:08:02 
Oct 24 20:08:02 /usr/local/caffe2/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/caffe2/python/onnx/tests/c2_ref_test.py:631: 
Oct 24 20:08:02 _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ 
Oct 24 20:08:02 /usr/local/caffe2/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/caffe2/python/onnx/tests/c2_ref_test.py:566: in _test_net
Oct 24 20:08:02     self._download(net_name)
Oct 24 20:08:02 /usr/local/caffe2/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/caffe2/python/onnx/tests/c2_ref_test.py:613: in _download
Oct 24 20:08:02     exit(1)
Oct 24 20:08:02 _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ 
Oct 24 20:08:02 
Oct 24 20:08:02 self = Use exit() or Ctrl-D (i.e. EOF) to exit, code = 1
Oct 24 20:08:02 
Oct 24 20:08:02     def __call__(self, code=None):
Oct 24 20:08:02         # Shells like IDLE catch the SystemExit, but listen when their
Oct 24 20:08:02         # stdin wrapper is closed.
Oct 24 20:08:02         try:
Oct 24 20:08:02             sys.stdin.close()
Oct 24 20:08:02         except:
Oct 24 20:08:02             pass
Oct 24 20:08:02 >       raise SystemExit(code)
Oct 24 20:08:02 E       SystemExit: 1
Oct 24 20:08:02 
Oct 24 20:08:02 /usr/lib/python2.7/site.py:375: SystemExit
Oct 24 20:08:02 ----------------------------- Captured stdout call -----------------------------
Oct 24 20:08:02 Downloading from https://s3.amazonaws.com/download.caffe2.ai/models/zfnet/predict_net.pb
Oct 24 20:08:02 Abort: Could not download model. [HTTP Error] 503: Service Unavailable.
Oct 24 20:08:02 Cleaning up...
Oct 24 20:08:02  generated xml file: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/caffe2_tests/python/result.xml -

Full log: https://circleci.com/gh/pytorch/pytorch/114415?utm_campaign=vcs-integration-link&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=github-build-link

body:
Example failure from intermittent network problem:

```
Oct 24 20:08:02 =================================== FAILURES ===================================
Oct 24 20:08:02 _________________________ TestCaffe2End2End.test_zfnet _________________________
Oct 24 20:08:02 
Oct 24 20:08:02 self = <caffe2.python.onnx.tests.c2_ref_test.TestCaffe2End2End testMethod=test_zfnet>
Oct 24 20:08:02 
Oct 24 20:08:02     @unittest.skipIf(
Oct 24 20:08:02         os.environ.get('JENKINS_URL'),
Oct 24 20:08:02         'Taking too long to download!')
Oct 24 20:08:02     def test_zfnet(self):
Oct 24 20:08:02 >       self._test_net('zfnet')
Oct 24 20:08:02 
Oct 24 20:08:02 /usr/local/caffe2/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/caffe2/python/onnx/tests/c2_ref_test.py:631: 
Oct 24 20:08:02 _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ 
Oct 24 20:08:02 /usr/local/caffe2/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/caffe2/python/onnx/tests/c2_ref_test.py:566: in _test_net
Oct 24 20:08:02     self._download(net_name)
Oct 24 20:08:02 /usr/local/caffe2/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/caffe2/python/onnx/tests/c2_ref_test.py:613: in _download
Oct 24 20:08:02     exit(1)
Oct 24 20:08:02 _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ 
Oct 24 20:08:02 
Oct 24 20:08:02 self = Use exit() or Ctrl-D (i.e. EOF) to exit, code = 1
Oct 24 20:08:02 
Oct 24 20:08:02     def __call__(self, code=None):
Oct 24 20:08:02         # Shells like IDLE catch the SystemExit, but listen when their
Oct 24 20:08:02         # stdin wrapper is closed.
Oct 24 20:08:02         try:
Oct 24 20:08:02             sys.stdin.close()
Oct 24 20:08:02         except:
Oct 24 20:08:02             pass
Oct 24 20:08:02 >       raise SystemExit(code)
Oct 24 20:08:02 E       SystemExit: 1
Oct 24 20:08:02 
Oct 24 20:08:02 /usr/lib/python2.7/site.py:375: SystemExit
Oct 24 20:08:02 ----------------------------- Captured stdout call -----------------------------
Oct 24 20:08:02 Downloading from https://s3.amazonaws.com/download.caffe2.ai/models/zfnet/predict_net.pb
Oct 24 20:08:02 Abort: Could not download model. [HTTP Error] 503: Service Unavailable.
Oct 24 20:08:02 Cleaning up...
Oct 24 20:08:02  generated xml file: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/caffe2_tests/python/result.xml -
```

Full log: https://circleci.com/gh/pytorch/pytorch/114415?utm_campaign=vcs-integration-link&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=github-build-link
